on_show.Title: Thappad
on_show.Writer: Mrunmayee Lagoo (screenplay), Mrunmayee Lagoo, Anubhav Sinha
on_show.Plot: Thappad is a story of Amrita whose seemingly perfect life is shattered when her husband slaps her once in a party. But is one slap enough to question what a relationship stands for?

on_show.Title: Kesari
on_show.Writer: Girish Kohli, Esat Ozcan, Anurag Singh
on_show.Plot: Based on an incredible true story of the Battle of Saragarhi in which an army of 21 Sikhs fought against 10,000 Afghans in 1897.

on_show.Title: Hirkani
on_show.Writer: Chinmay Mandlekar
on_show.Plot: Set during the reign of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, the film depicts the story of Hira, a simple village woman. When the gates of Raigad fort shut before she can leave, Hira dares to climb...

on_show.Title: Duniyadari
on_show.Writer: Chinmay Mandlekar (screenplay & dialogue)

on_show.Plot: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

on_show.Plot: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

on_show.Title: Fandry

on_show.Plot: It is about a teenager from a Dalit (Oppressed caste) family, who lives at the village fringe, and falls in love with an upper caste girl.
